title: Estimator
subtitle: Easily calculate and compare plans for your business.
planGuide: Use the slider to set monthly estimated token usage.

convert.title: Character/Page Conversion
convert.note: Assumption: KO 1 token≈1.6 chars, EN 1 token≈4.5 chars, A4 1 page≈2,200 chars (KO) / 3,600 chars (EN)

assumptions.characterConversion: Assumption: Korean 1 token ≈ 1.6 chars, English 1 token ≈ 4.5 chars

tokenInfo.title: Token/Model Cost Notice
tokenInfo.b1: • Seat(Base): Includes plan token Cap. No extra charge within Cap.
tokenInfo.b2: • Over-Cap policy: Block or purchase more.
tokenInfo.b3: • Seat(Base): Includes plan token Cap. No extra charge within Cap.

success.title: Payment completed successfully.
success.notice:
LLM Capsule B2B product requires deployment, server, and DB setup work, requiring an average of 2-3 months for implementation.
We will contact you within 3 business days after payment completion, so please confirm your contact email and phone number.

b2bInfo.text1: LLM Capsule B2B product requires deployment, server, and DB setup work, requiring an average of 2-3 months for implementation.
b2bInfo.text2: We will contact you within 3 business days after payment completion, so please confirm your contact email and phone number.
